instruction.rule1: You have to guess the hidden word in 6 tries and the color of the letters changes to show how close you are.
instruction.rule2: To start the game, just enter any word, for example:

incorect.text: are not in the target word at all.

almost.text: is in the word but in the wrong spot.

corect.text: is in the word and in the correct spot.

underframe.text: Another try to find matching letters in the target word.
